reviewText: Bought this collection to watch with my Grandkids.  We had a ball, added to the season.They loved it, they got so excited.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Thrills and Chills (Haunted Mansion, Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, Country Bears)

reviewText: These new 4-DVD sets Disney is releasing are interesting, but I don't know about this one. The Haunted Mansion was a huge disappointment, which could have been amazing (released shortly after the first Pirates of the Caribbean movie, which is the only really well-made one of the four). Tower of Terror--wasn't that a TV-only, B-movie? I don't recognize the Mr. Toad's Wild Ride movie, and didn't Country Bears flop too? Your money is probably better spent on the Ichabod and Mr. Toad DVD--The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad (Disney Gold Classic Collection)a set of two classic 50's era Disney cartoons that have been all-but forgotten by the company. The Legend of Sleepy Hollow cartoon is a wonderful take on the classic American story, narrated and sung by none other than Bing Crosby! It's perfect Disney fare for spooky family fun. The Mr. Toad cartoon is fun as well--classic animation, some famous voices, and a story any kid would enjoy. Do be warned, the weasel villains use some knives and guns, and even smoke cigars--so parents should decide whether they're comfortable with that prior to letting children watch. Still, The Legend of Sleepy Hollow will give more real 'Thrills & Chills' than this set.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Thrills and Chills (Haunted Mansion, Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, Country Bears)

reviewText: I bought this for my Daughters, mainly for the The Haunted Mansion and.The Tower of.Terror. The other two movies were pleasent bonuses. It was a big hit.
summary: 4 Fun movies for the price of one
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Thrills and Chills (Haunted Mansion, Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, Country Bears)

reviewText: My children and grandchildren and I have thourghly enjoyed this collection. Partly because we have managed to go on almost all of the rides. Then you watch the interpretation of the ride in movie form. I was very impressed with "Mr. Toad's Wild Ride". I was expecting it to be animated. To see humans actually protraying the animals was fantastic. It was certainly a positive choice when selecting this collection. An experience for the whole family.
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Thrills and Chills (Haunted Mansion, Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, Country Bears)

reviewText: I received this set as a gift for christmas and I loved watching each of the movies. I loved all 4 of them. I already knew that I liked The Haunted Mansion and the Country Bears. I never saw the Tower Of Terror or Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, I ended up enjoying them as much as the other two movies.I would recommend this four pack to any Disney Movie fan out there!
Title: Disney 4-Movie Collection: Thrills and Chills (Haunted Mansion, Tower Of Terror, Mr. Toad's Wild Ride, Country Bears)
